3.10.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.10.0 is available!
notes: Add synchronous sending option
Fix account ID on Sarlacc event records

3.9.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.9.1 is available!
notes: Fixed product link to registration during imports

3.9.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.9.0 is available!
notes: Added support for Magento 2.4.0

3.8.7.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.7 is available!
notes: Removed deprecated setUseSessionInUrl useage

3.8.6.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.6 is available!
notes: Add pagination to getList call on OrderRepository
Added logging and improved memory consumption on order import script

3.8.5.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.5 is available!
notes: Added support for transport class changes in Magento 2.3.3

3.8.4.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.4 is available!
notes: Added shutdown function to capture fatal errors during script execution requests

3.8.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.3 is available!
notes: Added - logic to resolve registrations when current scope doesn't match registered scope
Added - memory usage for script executions

3.8.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.2 is available!
notes: Addressed bug with setting from name on emails

3.8.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.1 is available!
notes: Added - Support for order shipped state changes

3.8.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.8.0 is available!
notes: Added - Support for Bronto Snippet Manager
Added - AutoConfig support

3.7.5.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.5 is available!
notes: Added - designConfig property to Bronto Email Template class
Added - logging to settings sync auth POST and import
Added - Accept-Encoding: gzip header http client

3.7.4.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.4 is available!
notes: Added support for populating the order-source in Order Import functionality

3.7.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.3 is available!
notes: Addressed bug in historical import filters
Fixed incorrect message caching when processing cart reminder triggers
Added scope support for browse fiddle
Added debug logging for delivery sends

3.7.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.2 is available!
notes: Bug fix for template variable tag renaming mechanism to allow it to encode properly
Adjusted cart/browse 'fiddle' initialization to properly handle an empty object for 'mage-cache-storage'

3.7.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.1 is available!
notes: Changes to align with new requirements for Magento marketplace certification

3.7.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.7.0 is available!
notes: Added support for Magento 2.3.0.

3.6.11.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.11 is available!
notes: Updated order transform to explicitly throw an exception when the order associated with a queued event no longer exists.

3.6.10.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.10 is available!
notes: Added debug logging for connector requests
Fixed Cart update reminder trigger to create an entry after the first product is added to the cart
Corrected trigger scheduling calculation

3.6.9.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.9 is available!
notes: Added support for autoconfiguration

3.6.8.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.8 is available!
notes: Fixed message template loading plugin bug when the module is disabled

3.6.7.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.7 is available!
notes: Fixed clean up threshold task

3.6.6.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.6 is available!
notes: Added exception handling for loading non-existent Quotes
Fixed Sale Price calculation when discounts are used for order events

3.6.5.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.5 is available!
notes: Fixed TID cookie TTL logic
Fixed Review Triggers to properly send
Fixed TID extension attributes for orders by removing jion definitions

3.6.4.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.4 is available!
notes: Added logging around order event transformation

3.6.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.3 is available!
notes: Fixed class import declaration

3.6.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.2 is available!
notes: Fixed cart collection loading by removing unused TID table join reference

3.6.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.1 is available!
notes: Return only parent products as line items on order and cart events
Fixed template loading with default values to address issues with template imports

3.6.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.6.0 is available!
notes: Updated Order Attribution process by introducing a new TID model to allow for the persistence of the TID value
Added support for PHP version 7.1 and Magento version 2.2.2

3.5.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.5.3 is available!
notes: Added order related variables to order deliveries
Avoid direct manipulation of Magento customer model during contact update

3.5.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.5.2 is available!
notes: Fixed list removal on unsubscribe
Added scope to tax inclusion in Cart Recovery

3.5.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.5.1 is available!
notes: Fixed scoped product URL transformation import records
Fixed function calls on import events

3.5.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.5.0 is available!
notes: Support for PHP 7

3.4.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.4.3 is available!
notes: Fixed Product options requirements
Added cart event dispatch when user subscribes to newsletters
Added observers to handle checkout optin changes and email address updates

3.4.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.4.2 is available!
notes: Fixed missing method

3.4.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.4.1 is available!
notes: Fixed double encoding of imported template variables

3.4.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.4.0 is available!
notes: Added custom URL configuration

3.3.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.3.1 is available!
notes: Fixed missing parent ID in configurable product import

3.3.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.3.0 is available!
notes: In-App Notification for Connector Update
Magento Certification Compliance

3.2.0.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.2.0 is available!
notes: Added setting to include tax with line item prices

3.1.7.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.7 is available!
notes: Fixes composer PHP version constraints

3.1.6.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.6 is available!
notes: Fixed regression issue in browse such that "VIEW" events are emitted instead of "VISIT" events.

3.1.5.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.5 is available!
notes: Fixed Conversion Tracking by adding an order event observer on cart completion
Added new JS to handle fiddling cart and browse events without back-end interaction

3.1.4.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.4 is available!
notes: Removed support for Recommendations
Fixed a bug that ignored a user preference during historical order imports
Newsletter Opt-In checkout checkbox renders at more appropriate locations
Added error handling for queue flush job

3.1.3.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.3 is available!
notes: Ensures Magento product deletions are properly reflected in Bronto

3.1.2.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.2 is available!
notes: Refactored some view models to allow for Full Page Caching
Removed support for Javascript Cart Recovery option. Cart Recovery Integration will now be API only.

3.1.1.message: The Bronto Connector Extension v3.1.1 is available!
notes: Returned to using Bronto specific order status instead of Magento's order status when importing to Bronto
